metadataAttributes.Title: Business Analytics Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Data-driven decision making potential unlocked. Learners will be able to obtain, manage, analyze and visualize data to gain a competitive advantage in the world of strategic business decision making.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Machine Learning, Analytics, Data Analysis, power bi, Rstudio, Business Analytics, R Programming, Health Care, R and RStudio, Data Cleansing and Exploration, Alteryx, Analytic Mindset,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Ronald Guymon ,Ashish Khandelwal ,Kevin Hartman ,Gies College of Business, University of Illinois ,Unnati Narang ,Joseph T. Yun ,
